1.title: Lou Holtz
1.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: Float Trip, Grand Canyon Style
2.plot: Float Trip, Grand Canyon Style- The story of the rebirth of a school and community in central Iowa destroyed by F5 tornado Tyhe Grand Ole Game goes to Gaylord- Mike Max goes into the town of Gaylord NHL Dreams- NHL hopefuls attempt to clear the last hurdle of making it into the bigs.

3.title: Tribute to the Troops, Harley's for Heroes
3.plot: Tribute to the Troops, Harely's for Heros- The story of the rebirth of a school and community in central Iowa destroyed by F5 tornado D3 Wonder-Coach- Bethel football has become a D3 powerhouse, he is the man behind the success Mark Twain's Hometown- A trip to Hannibal Missouri and the hometown of Mark Twain.

1.title: The Birth of Max
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: It's All About Attitude
2.plot: Why motivation is the most important thing, not only in sports, but in life. Special athletes put it all on the line for a competition NBA Sports-Hoop dreams in Vegas with some Timberwolf hopefuls.

3.title: Youth Football: Volunteering with Passion
3.plot: 6th grade football is all about the love of the game. Former Vikings coach Les Steckel talks about the use of steroids in various sports.

4.title: A Visit to a Bison Ranch
4.plot: Greg Thunder joins a group of 7th graders to the Silver Bison Ranch Shjon Podein, "The Power of One". The NHLer is making a difference Willie Mays interview.

5.title: The Boy Scouts: The Giving Spirit
5.plot: Mike Hebert, The Challenge of a Lifetime- The ultra-successful U of M volleyball coach faces his biggest challenge The Boy Scouts, "The Giving Spirit" - Greg Thunder joins the Boy Scouts for some roadway cleanup Welcome to the Bigs- Go behind the scenes with the Timberwolves number one pick in 2006 Michael Jordan Interview Clip.

6.title: Skating Parents - Dedication and Beyond
6.plot: Skating Parents, Dedication and Beyond- The behind the scenes commitment of skating parents Jack Morris- Mike spends quality time with this Minnesota Twins/Detroit Tigers Legend Kevin Garnett, "Giving Back"- Da Kid turns into Da Man by giving himself back to the community.

7.title: Mini Mite Hockey
7.plot: Mini Mite Hockey- The very very young learn the game of hockey Tommy Saterdalen, "Coaching with the Coaches" - The legendary high school hockey coach now coaches other coaches Mat Dynasty, Augsburg Wrestling with Jeff Swenson- A visit to a great college wrestling programs in the nation Marie Osmond Interview Clip.

8.title: Basketballs Boy Wonder: Isaiah Dahlman
8.plot: Tim Pawlenty, Always on the Go- He's our governor and Mike Max discovers where he gets his drive Basketballs Boy Wonder, Isaiah Dahlman- He's put the small town of Braham, Minnesota back on the map Dan Marso, Animation Artist- The creator of the "Rocky the Mudhen" cartoon.

9.title: Minnesota Gymnastics: A Leap of Commitment
9.plot: Keeping the "Faith" - This Minneapolis North coach coaches more than just high school basketball to her players Minnesota Gymnastics, A Leap of Commitment- Speical families and their commitments to gymnastics Let's Think Twins Baseball- Spring training comes a little early to Life to the Max!

10.title: Steve Gernander: Iron Range Upside Down
10.plot: He's from the Iron Range coaches JuCo buckets in Houston and lives in a dorm with farm Houston Aeros, The State of Hockey Southern Style. It's life on the farm for the wild's farm club in Houston.

1.title: A Day at the Dome
1.plot: A visit with Super Bowl winning coach Tony Dungy. The work that takes before a Twins game Polo for Beginners. Mike Max takes a look a polo.

2.title: Junior Volleyball Showdown
2.plot: Junior Volleyball Showdown- A nationwide gathering of volley ballers competing for the junior Olympics The Rocks Speaks- From wrestler to A list actor the Rock talks about life and his latest movie Whiffle Ball Madness- The wonderful world of whiffle ball.

3.title: The Trojan General, Pete Carroll
3.plot: the Trojan General, Pete Carroll- He is the genius behind the USC Football Program, we go to LA to visit Pete Carroll Twins Trainer Perry Castilano- Focus on Minnesota Twins trainer, Perry Castilano If the Show Fits, Steph Marbury- Always controversial, this NBA start has an idea that really fits for all budgets.

4.title: Landmark Center of the Preforming Arts
4.plot: Landmark Center of the Preforming Arts- An amazing school north of Boston which teaches confidence The Will of the Wild, Jacques Lemaire- Since day one he has been the heart and soul of the Minnesota Wild 100 Holes of Hope- Golfers golfing 100 holes in one day and helping fight aids in Africa.

5.title: Fantastic Fenway
5.plot: Fantastic Fenway- The crown jewel of ballparks and, yes, the hated Yanks are in town to play the Soxs New Richmond Student Student Service Day- New Richmond Wisconsin high school students give back to the community The Brothers McNamara, Pinky and Bob- Minnesota legends tell their story Pat Neshek, A Special Delivery- Twins pitcher shows us his delivery.

6.title: Minnesota's Sweet Lou
6.plot: "Super" Couple, Ben and Karyn Utecht- Ben Utecht wins the Super Bowl and his talents are endless Minnesota's Sweet Lou- Lou Nanne relives the days of the North Stars with a new book The Real Coach Carter- Coach Nen Carter and his Hollywood story of turning around inner city youth.

7.title: Gopher's Go to Washington
7.plot: Gopher's Go to Washington- The Gopher National Champion Wrestlers tour the Pentagon and the White House The Carney Family- Minnesota Wild's defense-man Keith Carney is a real family man Spike Lee- The famous director goes one on one with Mike Max.

8.title: Overcoming the Odds
8.plot: We go to Hollywood and catch up with Minnesota native, Roger Nygard. As well as the amazing story of Sartell High's Greta Perske and the power of determination.

9.title: Pheasant Time
9.plot: The Family O'Hagen- One son is a Harvard Quarterback and his brother works in Hollywood, and the Dad is a Hollywood agent Pheasent Time- It's that time of the year again, and Mike has a special hunting partner Joel Maturi- It's not an easy job running the Minnesota Gophers Athletic Department.

10.title: A Night with Bobby Knight
10.plot: A Night with Bobby Knight- This man needs no introduction, did we mention he is close friends with Sid Hartman Monkey Boy on the Loose, Extreme Guhru Dan Monskey- White water wonderman Dan Monskey hits the rapids and tells his story Gordie Howe, Hockey Royalty- This NHL legend goes one on one with Mike Max.

11.title: Record Breaking Rookie, Adrian Peterson
11.plot: Southern Minnesota's Super Jumper,Jim Dilling- Mankato States kangaroo kid who is considered the best jumper in the land Record Breaking Rookie, Adrian Peterson- From Oklahoma to a Super Bowl running back for the Vikings Ron Leafblat, The Desire to Succeed- His Midwestern roots have never left this super successful businessman.

12.title: Bud Grant, the Man Behind the Legend
12.plot: Bud Grant, The Man behind the Legend- He's the legendary coach who just turned 80, and this is the story of how he became a legend The Challenges of Parenting- It's never easy but here's some advice from the famous to the successful Flugtag, Introduction to Fun- These college girls have one goal: To build a floating vacuum cleaner named, Earl.

13.title: A Gifted Goalie
13.plot: A Gifted Goalie- The story of Catlain Tate, a 13 year old girl who has an amazing attitude considering she faces life with only one arm Eden Prairie High School Sports, Excellence Defined- The pinnacle of high school sports in Minnesota...why the success?

14.title: The Wizard of Westwood, John Wooden
14.plot: The Wizard of Westwood, John Wooden- Mike visits with the 97 year old college coaching legend at his Southern California home The Story of the Shiek- This wrestling icon of the AWA days tells the story of being a star in Iraq The Wizard of Westwood, John Wooden Pt 2- More with the Wizard of Westwood.

15.title: Pheasent Fest
15.plot: Jay Pivic, 500 Wins and Counting- This long time MCTC basketball coach gets his 500th win Pheasent Fest- The national pheasant fest comes to Minneapolis with 25,000 attendees Brian Lawton, Super Agent 98- From number pick to super agent to waiting for a GM job.

16.title: Old Time Hockey with Glen Sonmor
16.plot: Tribute to the Troops Harley Ride 2008- Harley riders riding to make money to support the families of our troops Old Time Hockey with Glken Sonmor- Now in his 70's and still going strong, this hockey legend looks back at 6 decades of hockey Prep Sports Publishers- Mike King has rolled out a new magazine on high school sports.

17.title: Broomball for Beginners
17.plot: The Black Knight- This teenager's life is literally a yo-yo: Meet world yo-yo artist John Narum Broomball for Beginners- Greg Thunder tries his hand at the strange game of CoEd broom-ball Nordic Ski Passion- Adventure junkie Dan Monkey takes us cross country skiing.

18.title: On the Bench with Pam Borton
18.plot: On the Bench with Pam Borton- Big 10 women's basketball coach gives up close view of coaching in the "bigs" Tony Larusso,A Doggone Good Guy- Baseball manager LaRusso goes one on one with Mike Max Never Back Down with Sean Faris- This 26 year old newcomer is taking Hollywood by storm and he discusses his road to success.

19.title: 43 Hoops Academy
19.plot: Mankato's Baseball Legend, Dan Boyer- Dan Boyer does much more than just a coach baseball, he coaches life lessons Dan Gable's keys to Being a Champ- The biggest name in college wrestling and winner of dozens of national championships 43 Hoops Academy- The biggest name in college wrestling and winner of numerous awards tells all.

20.title: The Success of Project Success
20.plot: The Success of Project Success- Bringing the arts to students of inner-city and changing lives WCHA, Excellence in College Hockey- We visit the annual Final Five Journey and experience action and excitement of colleges best league A Plumm Couple- Scott Erickson and his wife Lisa Guerro have gone Hollywood with," A Plumm Summer".

21.title: Vertical Endeavors
21.plot: Vertical Endevours- Dan Monsky climbs to new heights with this story on indoor rock climbing A Brush Above, Terrence Fogarty- He paints his heart, loving his Midwestern roots and sports An Enterprising Gathering-Greg Thunder visits the Trekkies who still believe space is the final frontier.

22.title: Rocketman of Shakopee
22.plot: High School Seniors Adventure of a Lifetime- Two Chaska high seniors celebrate graduation by floating a canoe to Hudson Bay Rocketman of Shakopee- Rocketman Greg Thunder learns the art of the launch Josh Stevenson's Angling Advantage- St. Paul's Josh Stevenson talk's fishing with Mike Max.

23.title: This Is Sid Hartman
23.plot: The life and times of Sid Hartman.

imdb.plot outline: "Life to the Max" is a show that highlights stories of perseverance, tenacity and winning attitudes. It is more than just a sports show; it's a program about those who look at the glass as half-full. The host, Mike Max, is a longtime television and radio personality, from the Twin Cities, who is always going the extra mile to find these positive people and their inspirational stories.
imdb.title: Life to the Max
plot: "_Life to the Max_ (qv)" is a show that highlights stories of perseverance, tenacity and winning attitudes. It is more than just a sports show; it's a program about those who look at the glass as half-full. The host, Mike Max, is a longtime television and radio personality, from the Twin Cities, who is always going the extra mile to find these positive people and their inspirational stories.::Anonymous
